description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as store and new tree planting (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 107 (proposed garden layout)

108 (proposed section full elevation); 109 (proposed garden store plans-elevations); 110 (existing site pictures); 111 (existing build site pictures); 112 (proposed trees top view); 113 (proposed trees top view)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the information shown on the approved plans, further details for the planting of semi-mature trees within the lawn shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved trees shall be planted within the next planting season to the date of this permission. Details of trees shall include: (i)  the species of tree ; (ii) the girth of the trunk ; (iii)  planting location within the lawn

Any planting that is part of the approved scheme that within a period of five years after planting is removed, dies or becomes seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season and all planting shall be replaced with others of a similar size and species and in the same position, unless the Local Planning Authority first gives written consent to any variation. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To provide visual amenity and improved urban greening and biodiversity within the Hanger Hill (Haymills) Conservation Area and to preserve and enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with Development Strategy 2026 (2012); policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021); The London Environment Strategy (2018); and policies 5.10, 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); the National Planning Policy Framework (2021); and the Hanger Hill (Haymills) Conservation Area Management Plan and Appraisal. | The proposed  rear outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used or adapted for habitable accommodation as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use. No kitchen shall be installed.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties or Hanger Hill (Haymills) Conservation Area, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
